嵹字的基本解释

嵹
jiàng
〔嵹台山〕即“西倾山”，在中国青海、甘肃、四川省交界处。

嵹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàng］
［《集韻》其亮切，去漾，羣。］
亦作“1”。
山名用字。青海、甘肃、四川三省交界处有嵹台山，又称西倾山。

嵹字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页318第02
【集韻】其亮切，强去聲。山也。【水經注】洮水與墊江水俱出嵹臺山東北，逕土谷渾中。【山海經註】白洮至嵹，南北三百里，地草皆龍鬚，無樵柴，謂之嵹川。亦作漒，讀若强。

嵹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嵹字的起名意思

暂无。

And
Basic explanation of words
And
jiàng
[Xietai Mountain] is the "Western Dip Mountain", at the junction of Qinghai, Gansu and Sichuan provinces in China.
And
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàng］
["Ji Yun" its bright cut, go to Yang, group. ]
Also called "1".
The name of the mountain is written in words. At the junction of the three provinces of Qinghai, Gansu, and Sichuan, there is Mount Kaitai, also known as the Westward Mountain.
And
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵹; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 318 02
【Ji Yun】It is bright and cut, and strong to the sound. Mountain also. [Water Classics] Taoshui and Dianjiang water both flow out from the northeast of Taishan Mountain, in the middle of muddy valleys. [Notes to the Shanhaijing] From Baitao to Hei, three hundred miles from north to south, the ground and grass are all dragon's whiskers, and there is no wood and firewood. It is also used as a slogan, and read if it is strong.
